title: Red lentil tarka dal
ingredients: ['150g red lentils', '1 tablespoon curry powder', '1 tablespoon ground turmeric', '2 bay leaves', '1 (1cm) piece root ginger, grated', '1 pinch salt', '1 tomato, chopped', 'For the tarka', '1 tablespoon ghee (Indian butter)', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '1 pinch asafoetida', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper', '2 tablespoons fresh coriander leaves']
